#summary Tellurium Contributor List
#labels Phase-Support

Tellurium Contributors are categorized into development team, support team, evangelism team, and users. Former team members are also listed here.


== Development Team ==

  * *Jian Fang*: Jian graduated from Georgia Institue of Technology with a Ph.D. degree. He works as a senior software engineer in a company and mainly focuses on architecting, desigining, and implementing enterprise applications. He is both a researcher and a developer. He is the Tellurium project owner and the principal developer. Tellurium Core, TrUMP 0.1.0, jQuery Selector, Reference Projects, Widget Projects, Tellurium Maven Archetypes, and Engine 0.1.0.

  * *Vivek Mongolu*: TrUMP prototype and TrUMP 0.1.0.

  * *Mikhail Koryak*: TrUMP 0.1.0, jQuery support for Tellurium, and Engine 0.1.0

  * *Matt Senter*: Tellurium Maven support, Tellurium build and release, and Tellurium Maven repository maintenance.  

  * *Haroon Rasheed*: Tellurium Reference projects, Selenium Grid support, and Tellurium Linkedin Group management.
